entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 23 except 17 near Lake Superior.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 23 except 17 near Lake Superior. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 12 May 2023
